payload.content: As 2025 concludes, consumer AI is transitioning into a new phase where a limited number of products dominate everyday use, multimodal models have enabled novel creative workflows, and major AI labs have significantly expanded into consumer experiences.

name: As 2025 concludes, consumer AI is transitioning into a new phase where a limited
content: As 2025 concludes, consumer AI is transitioning into a new phase where a limited number of products dominate everyday use, multimodal models have enabled novel creative workflows, and major AI labs have significantly expanded into consumer experiences.

payload.content: By the end of 2025, it has become clearer which AI ideas successfully altered user behavior and which did not.

name: By the end of 2025, it has become clearer which AI ideas successfully altered us
content: By the end of 2025, it has become clearer which AI ideas successfully altered user behavior and which did not.

payload.content: Consumer AI appears to be moving towards a winner-take-most market structure.

name: Consumer AI appears to be moving towards a winner-take-most market structure.
content: Consumer AI appears to be moving towards a winner-take-most market structure.

payload.content: Subtle product design choices can be more impactful than the raw quality of the underlying AI model in consumer AI.

content: Subtle product design choices can be more impactful than the raw quality of the underlying AI model in consumer AI.

payload.content: Templates, multimodality, and distribution are key factors shaping the next generation of consumer AI products.

content: Templates, multimodality, and distribution are key factors shaping the next generation of consumer AI products.
